title: How Do I Do The "Alt+Enter" For Mac Computer? Where You Exit Out Of Fullscreen Mode In-Game.

replies.body: If you don't have an Alt key, what happens if you try Cmd + Ctrl + Enter?  Let me know!
Nothing Happens. I Tried It, Thanks.

That's strange to hear, but I don't want to give up.  There might be an issue with your keyboard or some software getting in the way.  Can you try another keyboard?  You can also try[ resetting your config](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#mq2) to see if that helps, and test it in a custom game to avoid penalties.  Let me know if it helps!
